experience.title: Data Analytics Intern
experience.description: Spaceonova, an EdTech Company, aimed to analyze customer attendance in their webinars and masterclasses across diverse topics. In my role as a data analyst, I conducted thorough Data Cleaning on Excel files containing registered participant data. I then designed and implemented a comprehensive Power BI dashboard. This dashboard included interactive visualizations showcasing attendee demographics, registration statuses, payment statuses, and other pertinent details, facilitating deeper insights and strategic decision-making for Spaceonova.
experience.description_html: Spaceonova, an EdTech Company, aimed to analyze customer attendance in their webinars and masterclasses across diverse topics. In my role as a data analyst, I conducted thorough Data Cleaning on Excel files containing registered participant data. I then designed and implemented a comprehensive Power BI dashboard. This dashboard included interactive visualizations showcasing attendee demographics, registration statuses, payment statuses, and other pertinent details, facilitating deeper insights and strategic decision-making for Spaceonova.
